php.LBL_VIES_DESC: Checks if the business entity has a valid VAT-EU number for intra-community transactions within the European Union.
php.LBL_VATIFY_DESC_EU: Fetch data from VATify.eu database, which also contains the taxpayer's current status
php.LBL_ORB_DESC: Fetching companies data from around the world
php.LBL_NORTH_DATA_DESC: Fetching data about companies North Data's company database
php.LBL_USA_EDGAR_DESC: Fetch data on US companies from the United States Securities and Exchange Commission via EDGAR
php.LBL_PL_VAT_PAYER_DESC: The service allows you to verify whether an entity is an active, exempt, or unregistered VAT taxpayer in Poland
php.LBL_PL_GUS_DESC: Fetch data on Polish companies from the online REGON 1(BIR1) database provided by GUS
php.LBL_PL_KRS_DESC: Fetch data on Polish companies from The National Court Register in Poland (KRS)
php.LBL_PL_CEIDG_DESC: Fetch data on Polish companies from the Central Register and Information on Economic Activity in Poland (CEIDG)
php.LBL_UK_CH_DESC: Fetch data on UK companies from the Comapnies House agency
php.LBL_UK_CH_NOT_FOUND_NO_DATA: No NCR or company name has been set
php.LBL_UK_VAT_PAYER_DESC: The service allows you to verify whether a company is registered as a VAT taxpayer in United Kingdom
php.LBL_UK_VAT_PAYER_CONFIRM: The entity with the given number is an UK VAT payer
php.LBL_UK_VAT_PAYER_NOT_CONFIRM: The entity with the given number is not an UK VAT payer
php.LBL_FR_ENTERPRISE_GOUV_DESC: Fetch data on French companies from the INSEE (Institut National de la Statistique et des Études Économiques)
php.LBL_BR_RECITA_WS_CNPJ_DESC: Fetch data on Brazilian companies from the database of the Federal Tax Office of Brazil (Cadastro Nacional de Pessoas Jurídicas) provided by Receita WS
php.LBL_BR_RECITA_WS_CNPJ_ERROR: The query limit has been exceeded. Wait one minute.
php.LBL_NO_BRREG_ENHETSREGISTERET_DESC: Fetch data on Norwegian companies from the Central Brønnøysund Database (The Brønnøysund Register Centre)
php.LBL_NO_BRREG_ENHETSREGISTERET_400: Organization number must be a number with exactly 9 digits.
php.LBL_DK_CVR_DESC: Fetch data on Danish and Norwegian companies via CVR API from the Danish Central Business Register (CVR)
php.LBL_UA_YOU_CONTROL_DESC: Fetch data on Ukrainian companies from the YouControl database provided by YouScore API
php.LBL_CH_ZEFIX_DESC: Fetch data on Swiss companies from the Swiss Central Business Name Index (Zentraler Firmenindex)
